name: Juleposthuset
description:
An old Danish christmas calendar played on radio in 1987.

It is written by two well known (in DK) artists and comeidians. The game is my version of the radio-play. Unfortunately, it gives no sence in other languages. And therefore is is only in Danish.

This version includes dec 1 to dec 6. The intention is to have all 24 days in the complete game.
